name: Edwin William
description: I am social, romantic, passionate, smart, intelligent, cool headed, adaptive, have a big heart. And i do believe in the truth and honesty as God is first in my life…i believe that honesty is the only key to human success, and with honest, i believe in myself and my life is really based on truth, and its all about who i really am.I know the kind of man i am and the way i treat others.I really do care alot about others who care for me, because i am a very caring and passionate man and my heart is so blessed and lovely…I believe in devoting my time, my life, my heart, my body and my soul to my loved one and make her real happy, because he’s my joy and happiness, and i always do look forward to that day i will get to meet my dream woman
